itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Evan Hafer discuss why North Korea sucks, and the hypothetical possibility of an "Aleppo Button" that would ship all of the entitled people in the world to Aleppo automatically.
